attributes.action: Abolish or halt fuel duty escalation and reduce fuel duty taxes to levels of year 2000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petrol and Diesel are the life blood of UK economy and current rates of duty are having a crippling effect on all members of the UK workforce.  The UK is being placed at an economic disadvantage with little or no impact on the climate warming issue.  Halt the fuel escalator now and reduce the negatigve impact of fuel taxes on UK tax payers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
